title.rendered: Alticor Inc Awarded CMAR Contract at Austin-Bergstrom Airport

content.rendered:
Alticor Inc was awarded a Construction Manager-at-Risk contract for the concessions build-out at Austin-Bergstrom International Airport (ABIA) in Austin, Texas. This contract is with Delaware North Travel Hospitality Inc., a hospitality, food service and retail company, servicing airports and sports venues across the globe.

The scope of work consists of food services spaces, retail, travel, and an off-site commissary. The Services Group anticipates commencement of construction in January of 2016, with a December 2017 completion. Alticor Inc looks forward to successful completion of this project and a new, long-standing relationship with Delaware North.
